name: Tick-Tock
game_setup: Place ten tokens on this sheet (eight if playing with four planets per player).
description: You have the power of Patience. Each time any player wins an encounter as the defense or a deal is made between any two players, use this power to discard one token from this sheet. If there are no more tokens on this sheet, you immediately win the game. You may still win the game via the normal method.
lore: Lurking in the depths of space-time beyond even the warp itself, this mechanical race waits patiently for the heat-death of the Universe, when it will rule over the strange abyss that remains. In the meantime, they subtly turn the races of the Universe against each other to prevent them from discovering a way to prevent the inevitable.

wild.description: When the discard pile is shuffled to create a new deck, you may immediately establish a colony on any one other player's home planet with up to four of your ships.

super_flare.description: When you win an encounter or make a deal, you may send one of your ships to the warp to discard a token from your sheet. This is in addition to any tokens you may discard through normal use of your power.
